description:
We thought it would be fun to get to know Brandon a little bit better and what makes him tick. What a better place to do that than in his natural habitat: the gym.
	
Brandon opens up about why he works so hard at getting in shape and even opens up a bit about some upcoming experiences.  We shot this project entirely different than most of our shoots. 

Enjoy watching Brandon do what he does best.
title: Model Spotlight: Brandon
